author: Raj Narayan
title: iPhone SE, OnePlus 8 take different routes to lure Indian customers
description: Apple and OnePlus seem to have chalked out strategies to corner a larger share of the Indian market, and the by the look of it, they seem to be traveling in opposite directions
content: Desperate times call for desperate measures and both Apple and OnePlus have responded to the global lockdown by launching smartphones that could lure buyers due to their pricing. However, the surprise element is that the actual price difference between the ne… [+5180 chars]
